T.query: select id,surveyid from questions where (required = 't' and questioncode >'7') or  questionposition = 1 or externalsystemid <70

F.query: select id,surveyid from questions where (required = 't' and questioncode >'8') or  questionposition = 1 or externalsystemid <70
select id,surveyid from questions where (required = 't' and questioncode >='7') or  questionposition = 1 or externalsystemid <70
select id,surveyid from questions where (required = 't' and questioncode >'7') or  questionposition = 1 or ( externalsystemid <70 and etl_time >'2016-12-10')
select id,surveyid from questions where (required = 't' and questioncode >'7') or  questionposition = 1 or imageid <70
select id,surveyid from questions where (required = 't' and questioncode >'7') or  questionposition = 1
select id,surveyid from questions where (required = 't' and questioncode >'8') or  questionposition = 1 or externalsystemid <70
